message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $8,500. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,200. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $7,200 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $7,800? That's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $7,800 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $7,500, though.
